bug.author: joemaniaci
bug.summary: Template Update: Load, Modify, and Save an Image
bug.description:
Just for full Tutorial completeness without having to track down headers to include, include the following... <denchmark-code>#include <opencv2/imgproc/imgproc.hpp> #include <stdio.h> </denchmark-code>
For users that install the latest openCV version, in my case 2.4.13. [http://docs.opencv.org/2.4/doc/tutorials/introduction/load_save_image/load_save_image.html]
